標題： 【2024 Indigenous Knowledge Public Lecture Series】Challenges and Opportunities for Indigenous Rights
日期： Tue, 26 Nov 2024 17:02:14 +0800

Join us as we welcome our honored guests from West Sydney University,Australia.

【2024 Indigenous Knowledge Public Lecture Series】

◎Speaker : Dr. Umin Itei｜Hung-Yu RU
◎Topic : Culturally safe long-term care services for the Indigenous Peoples of Taiwan
◎Date : 27 Nov 2024 10:00-12:00
◎Location : CIS A318

Dr. Umin Itei｜Hung-Yu RU
Associate Professor at the Department of Indigenous Affairs and Development. Dr. RU received his PhD in Anthropology from the University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa, USA. His research interests are medical anthropology, Indigenous health and well-being, long-term care, and local creative development.
